title: BONUS Episode:  Pregnant mom, 2 girls found dead inside oil tanks at dad's job
itunes:title: BONUS Episode:  Pregnant mom, 2 girls found dead inside oil tanks at dad's job
description:
Hours after Chris Watts made an emotional plea for help finding his missing wife and 2 young daughters, the Colorado man led police to their bodies hidden in oil tanks near where he worked. Nancy Grace looks at the murder case with pathologist Dr. Michelle DuPre, forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan, psychiatrist Dr. Judith Joseph, and CrimeOnline.com reporter Ellen Killoran.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
